name.ch: 神經科學論文的寫作與表達

department.en: International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience
department.ch: 跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程

remark.ch: 中研院跨領域研究大樓B100，授課教師：簡正鼎

goal.en: To improve the writing and presentation skills of PhD students.

content.en:
1. General introduction and communication
2. Powerpoint presentation/endnote
3. Background introduction of your topics/labs, your preliminary data (preliminary results >1 page/introduction > 1 page/ references > 5)
4. Classes in Scientific Writing
5. Classes for presenting your outlines (title, 1 page/abstract, 1 page/Specific aims (2-4) and hypothesis (1 paragraph, 1 page, references > 10)
6. Classes for presenting your research design and methods (rationale, experimental approaches, data analysis for each aim/sub-aim, > 2 pages, references > 15)
7. Polish your Abstract for the June 1 deadline
8. Classes: writing, writing, writing and presentation

textbook.en: Successful Scientific Writing: A Step-by-Step Guide for the Biological and Medical Sciences 4th Edition, by Janice R. Matthews (Author), Robert W. Matthews (Author)
